API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.parser.MD3Parser

type
class
extends
AParser
implements
IParser
version
3.1
Transforms an MD3 file into Sandy MD3 primitive.

Creates a KeyFramedTransformGroup as rootnode with MD3 primitives as it's children.

Static Variables

defaultOrientation : sandy.util.DataOrder

Constructor

new()
parameters
p_sUrl This can be either a String containing an URL or a an embedded object
defaultName The name of the part. If set to null, the name from the md3 header will be used, which is often empty
p_nScale The scale factor
p_oTextureData A loader queue with all related textures loaded
p_sTextureExtension Overrides texture extension. You might want to use it for models that specify PCX textures.
Creates a new MD3Parser instance
